mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Château de Versailles (Versailles, France)
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Le roi promettant de venir à Paris avec sa famille, Salve d'Artillerie devant le Château de Versailles The King promises to come to Paris with his family, Salut of Arms before the Versailles castle
mdRecord.dcterms:description: In front of a large palace, troops are standing in formation and a carriage is pushed by a crowd of men
